name: Pakistan
startIntroPart2: Gandhis worst nightmare. Or probably his best dream if you think about it, since now he can rain nuclear hellfire on India's arch-nemisis now!
declaringWar: Our armed forces are the servants of the people, and the people beg for war.
attacked: Failure is a word unknown to me.
defeated: I have lived as plain Mr. Jinnah and I will die as plain Mr. Jinnah.
introduction: I welcome you to the Republic of Pakistan, I sincerely hope that our relationship will be friendly and cordial.
hateNo: Do you think we are stupid?
afterPeace: Think a hundred times before you take a decision, but once that decision is taken, stand by it as one man.
tradeRequest: I do not believe in taking the right decision, I take a decision and make it right. This decision will be no different for you.

name: Somaliland
declaringWar: Your eyes have strayed away from us for far too long, now is our time to strike!
defeated: Our freedom was temporary after all. We shall be bound as slaves for the rest of eternity then.
introduction: Hello, We welcome you to our nation.
neutralHello: Have you finally come here to bless us with recogition yet? No? Oh well...
hateHello: What have you come here for?
tradeRequest: Please accept this deal, it is the best we can offer
uniques: [50]% of excess happiness converted to [Production] <upon declaring friendship>

name: The Mughals
declaringWar: Time for you to recive the blessing of being part of our glorious empire!
attacked: Our troops are ready to burn your cities to the ground.
defeated: Our capital has been sacked, our art and culture has been burned to the ground, ... You are now the Emperor of the Mughals.
introduction: Hello, We welcome you to our nation.
hateHello: You are not worth my time.
tradeRequest: This trade will benifit us both
uniques: [+50]% Production when constructing [Cultural] wonders [in all cities]<during a Golden Age>
